display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: Apneas with >=2% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >=2% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp2 + hrop2 + hnrbp2 + hnrop2 + carbp2 + carop2 + canbp2 + canop2 + oarbp2 + oarop2 + oanbp2 + oanop2 ) / slpprdp
